metadata.title: CVE-2025-21665 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:filemap: avoid truncating 64-bit offset to 32 bitsOn 32-bit kernels, folio_seek_hole_data() was inadvertently truncating a64-bit value to 32 bits, leading to a possible infinite loop when writingto an xfs filesystem.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
